title: The Mike Rosen Radio Show OCT-24-2013 THURS
description:
The Mike Rosen Radio Show OCT-24-2013 THURS




Thursday, October 24, 2013
Myth Of Pre-Kindergarten Benefits

 
 

  9AM hour

1. Mike explains the difference between median and mean in relation to
    the "average" cost to a Colorado family of the proposed school tax increase of amendment 66.

2. Discussion of recalled John Morse's interview this morning on KOA's Colorado Morning News.




  10AM hour

Guest: Red Jahncke, President of the Townsend Group - "The 'Universal Pre-K' Fallacy."

Link to article

  11AM hour

Mike relates statistics on those receiving benefits from government programs.
